meta.title: LNGRZUI | Layout Documentation
meta.description: Explore different layout options for your application.

content.overview-desc: The Layout page demonstrates the Layout component, which offers a flexible and customizable layout system for your application.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Layout component, and wrap your application content with it. Customize the layout using the provided props.
